content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one change in French politics or society achieved by the liberal phase of the French Revolution.Explain how the radicalization of the French Revolutionary regime led to one change prior to Napoleon's takeover of the French government.Explain one way in which the regime of Napoleon represented a continuity with the radical phase of the French Revolution.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one change in French politics or society achieved by the liberal phase of the French Revolution.Explain how the radicalization of the French Revolutionary regime led to one change prior to Napoleon's takeover of the French government.Explain one way in which the regime of Napoleon represented a continuity with the radical phase of the French Revolution.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
